# Method dhcp_server6_delete

## Description
	Delete a DHCP6 server

## Mandatory Input Parameters

## Input Parameters
	* dhcp6_id: type: >0
	* dhcp6_name: type: string, max length: 255
	* hostaddr: type: ipv4_addr
	* validate_warnings: type: enum, values: accept

## Returned Values
	* ret_oid
	* errno
	* errmsg
	* msg
	* severity
	* parameters
	* param_format
	* param_value
	* ret_code
